description:
This is a new Udemy course to get you prepared for the NBA playoffs playing DFS basketball. This course teaches you the daily fantasy basketball resources and strategies you need to win big cash prizes.  Eleven lectures explain to you what contests to enter and how to build the optimal lineup to win the most money.  

Learn how to use online tools that the daily fantasy experts use to create their lineups and have fun watching your DFS team in NBA action.

I'll show you a live lineup build and how you can turn just $1 into $1,000 in only eight hours with daily fantasy sports!
title: Make Money Playing Daily Fantasy Sports Basketball
